LanguageData.RK_Gunlance_NormalType.label: ratkin gunlance(normal)
LanguageData.RK_Gunlance_NormalType.description:
A lance equipped with the ability to fire shells. Its distinctive feature is its ability to shoot blank shells that explode in front of the user.
"Wyvern's Fire":fire off a huge explosion. Use carefully because once you use it, you can't stop it.

Normal type: Can shell at short distance.
LanguageData.RK_Gunlance_NormalType.tools.0.label: gunlnace
LanguageData.RK_Gunlance_NormalType.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.RK_Gunlance_SpreadType.label: ratkin gunlance(spread)
LanguageData.RK_Gunlance_SpreadType.description:
A lance equipped with the ability to fire shells. Its distinctive feature is its ability to shoot blank shells that explode in front of the user.
"Wyvern's Fire":fire off a huge explosion. Use carefully because once you use it, you can't stop it.

Spread type: It explodes a little wider, leaving flames on the target after explosion.
LanguageData.RK_Gunlance_SpreadType.tools.0.label: gunlnace
LanguageData.RK_Gunlance_SpreadType.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.GunlanceExplosion.label: explosion
LanguageData.RK_WyvernAmmo_NormalType.label: wyvern ammo(normal)
LanguageData.RK_WyvernAmmo_NormalType.description: A shell filled with high explosives. Can be fired from gunlance. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.RK_WyvernAmmo_SpreadType.label: wyvern ammo(spread)
LanguageData.RK_WyvernAmmo_SpreadType.description: A shell filled with high explosives. Can be fired from gunlance. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.GunlancePreIgnition.label: ignition
LanguageData.GunlanceAfterIgnition.label: ignition
